      • strVal=(r: TFullReg; s: VmString)
  • Exports
  Source   Edit

This file implements the new evaluation engine for Nim code. An instruction is 1-3 int32s in memory, it is a register based VM.

Imports

../ast/ast, ../ast/errorhandling, ../ast/errorreporting, ../ast/lineinfos, ../ast/renderer, ../ast/trees, ../ast/idents, ../ast/reports, ../ast/typesrenderer, ../ast/types, ../ast/parser, ../modules/modulegraphs, ../front/options, ../front/msgs, ../front/cli_reporter, ../utils/debugutils, ../utils/int128, ../utils/btrees, ../utils/bitsets, ../sem/sighashes, ../sem/macrocacheimpl, ../sem/transf, ../sem/passes, ../sem/evaltempl, vmprofiler, gorgeimpl, vmchecks, vmcompilerserdes, vmdef, vmdeps, vmerrors, vmhooks, vmjit, vmmemory, vmobjects, vmops, vmtypegen, vmtypes

Types

ExecErrorReport = object
  stackTrace*: SemReport     ## The report storing the stack-trace
  report*: SemReport         ## The report detailing the error
